lyrics:
9 contributorsthis  love lyricsverse 1 danny odonoghue
its in the eyes of our children

its in the heart of a soldier
as he takes the bullet on the front line
its in the face of a mother
as she takes the force of the blow
and its in the hands of a father yeah
as he works his fingers to the bone yeah
